Document: ## Core Rules These are the general rules of RMC14. Click them for more information. - [textlink="1. This is a English server, please only use English." link="RMCLanguage"] - [textlink="2. Do not use multiple accounts, or alt accounts, and do not share accounts." link="RMCMultikey"] - [textlink="3. Follow the rules of escalation against non-hostiles." link="RMCRulesEscalation"] - [textlink="4. Don't use information gained from outside your character's knowledge." link="RMCMetaknowledge"] - [textlink="5. Don't antagonize your team, don't harass players." link="RMCKindness"] - [textlink="6. Don't quit a command level role without notice." link="RMCCommandRoles"] - [textlink="7. Mutinies, riots and similar activity require admin permission." link="RMCMutinies"] - 8. Don't disconnect if you do not get the role/kit you want, be considerate. - 9. Follow the roleplay rules and standards of the server. (Outlined at the bottom of this page)
